content:
I will be writing my next "How to speed up the Rust compiler" blog post early next week. Normally I just write about stuff I've done, but I want to cover all the important roadmap-related activity. Here is a rough list of things I want to mention that others have done:

  • @Jakub Ber√°nek
    • https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-perf/pull/1181
    • https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/94704
    • https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/95724
    • various website improvements
  • @lqd
    • https://github.com/dtolnay/quote/pull/210
    • https://github.com/hyperium/hyper/pull/2770
    • https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/95473
  • @martingms
    • https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/94776
  • @Michael Wigard
    • various website improvements
  • @rylev :
    • various site/reporting improvements
  • Jakub, lqd, rylev:
    • benchmark updates
Please let me know if I am overlooking anything of note!
